data.description:
T&T 315

Crafting Components: Shell that’s been home to three different sea creatures

While wearing this charm you gain a swim speed equal to your Speed, or you can break the charm to release its power, destroying it to activate one of the following effects.

• Breathe: Cast @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.ibapaaz63sgen1ao]{Water Breathing}.
• Cure: Cast @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.n38oneuah7io59c9]{Cure Wounds} at 3rd-level (+3 spellcasting ability modifier).
• Numb: Cast @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.18vcyto3p7wj17cx]{Sleet Storm} (spell save DC 15).

Curse. Releasing the charm’s power attracts the attention of a marid or water elemental who seeks you out to recruit you for a task.
